thread.section_title: willisorchards.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of willisorchards.com | willisorchards.com
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text:
I was sorely tempted to give you no higher than a 3 because:
Not until AFTER I had ordered and paid for the two trees, was I informed that the trees would not ship until March or April. I placed the order in late November or early December. All throughout their website it was stated that shipments would be made in around 10 days. Four or five months is NOT 10 days.
The trees arrived March 10, as much later promised. Our area was reeling from the first real cold snap of the season, with night time lows around 5F. I called and was advised I could store the saplings in a dark cold location, which I did. I actually planted the trees March 22. I do not know yet if the trees have survived. I'll have to wait and see.
My suggestion for this nursery is to state on their website that delivery is not necessarily 10 days and to confirm to the customer the shipping date PRIOR TO PLACING THE ORDER.
